message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the recommendation. I'd like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $135.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to stick to my original proposal of $120 for the product.
I understand you're sticking to your original proposal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. How about we meet at $132? I'm willing to sell the product for $132.
